The 10-Point Checklist for Choosing Your Next Warehouse & Freight Partner in Africa

By GKS Logistics Team January 20, 2025

The African continent is one of the most dynamic and rapidly growing markets in the world. With the rise of e-commerce and the implementation of the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA), the opportunity for businesses to expand is immense. However, this opportunity comes with unique challenges: complex customs, congested ports, and varied infrastructure. At GKS Logistics, we've helped dozens of businesses navigate these exact hurdles. We understand that choosing the right warehouse and freight partner is no longer just a business decision—it's a critical strategic advantage.

GKS Logistics: Chronologie de la Croissance

2019

Establishment of the first logistics hub in West Africa with modern facilities in Bamako.

2020

Expansion of air network with international strategic partnerships despite pandemic challenges.

2021

Modernization of real-time tracking systems and route optimization to improve operational efficiency.

2022

Launch of specialized maritime services and development of sustainable logistics solutions.

2023

Expansion into East Africa with opening of new regional distribution centers.

2024

Carbon neutrality initiative and adoption of green technologies across all our operations.

2025

Carbon neutrality goal achieved and launch of next-generation smart logistics solutions.

Our vision is to transform logistics in Africa through innovation, excellence and partnership.

Mr. Aboubacar Sidiki Konate, CEO & Founder

Africa's Logistics Future

Africa is positioning itself as a key player in global logistics thanks to its demographic and economic growth.

Investments in infrastructure and technology are transforming the continental logistics landscape.

Public-private partnerships are accelerating the development of innovative logistics solutions.

Key 2025 Trends

Sustainable Logistics

Sustainable practices are becoming central to African companies' logistics strategies.

Énergie solaire
Emballages recyclables
Neutralité carbone

Digital Transformation

Massive adoption of digital technologies is transforming logistics operations in Africa.

Optimisation routes
Automatisation
Analyse de données

Supply Chain Resilience

Building resilient supply chains is becoming a strategic priority.

Réseau diversifié
Stockage stratégique
Protocoles continuité

Beyond a Vendor, You Need a Partner

As Africa's economic landscape evolves, your supply chain will be a key driver of your success. Don't choose a logistics provider based on the cheapest quote. Choose a strategic partner who can navigate the complexities, manage the risks, and provide the technology and transparency you need to grow your business with confidence.

GKS Logistics combines deep local expertise with modern technology. This 10-point checklist isn't just an article—it's the standard we hold ourselves to every day.
